extendedInfo.description: Real Time RecorderWhy is Real Time Recorder?Real Time Recorder simplifies all the process to record voices and design for high quality sound recording. No need to light up the screen or open the application especially. Just press the volume up to enable recording during the screen off. The key of volume down or power can stop recording. Check the recordings in List page. Try it and enjoy itFeatures:â No need to light up the screen or open applicationâ- Volume key to enable and disable recording- Wave/pcm encoding with adjustable sample rate(8-48kHz)- User friendly for recordings list- Selectable storage way for SD card or Gmail- 16bits and stereo-  Long-time sound recordingNote:Real Time Recorder may not work properly on some devices.Please feel free to send me feedback via email if you have any question.
